about_the_game:
Welcome to Slingshot Trip!


Your goal is to survive as long as possible on the arena, and the only way to do that is by shooting down waves of enemies using your unique slingshot.

The action takes place on a beautiful arena, full of many elements that you can use to your advantage during the game. For example, in some places, there are traps that you can activate to deal damage to enemies or block their movements. You can also use various shields to avoid attacks or hide from the enemy.

Your slingshot is equipped with different types of ammunition, including fiery projectiles that can deal a lot of damage to enemies or traps, as well as harmful projectiles that affect enemies through plasma or frost. You can also collect new types of ammunition during the game, which will allow you to adjust your strategy to the given stage.

To increase your chances of survival, you must demonstrate dexterity and quick thinking. Avoid enemy attacks, use the elements of the arena, plan your attacks, and try to maintain as much distance as possible between you and the enemy.

Try to beat other players' records to earn your place at the top of the leaderboard.

Enjoy the fantastic, intense gameplay of Slingshot Trip on VR and become a master of slingshot shooting in virtual reality!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Zgodna z DirectX
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: Brak

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 \ Radeon RX Vega 64 \ Radeon RX 5600 XT
